reviews.review: You'll hate this game but play it anyways

like friday the thirteenth but less gay

If you, like myself, are a cinematic horror fan, or even just a horror game fan, than this is a good game to pick up. It is reasonably priced, considering the immense amount of downloadable content for later purchases should you feel the need to play as some of your favorite horror icons. There is a wide range of killers to choose from, some are easy to start as, while others are meant for my seasoned players, regardless of the circumstance; there is a killer out there for your play style. However, as much as I do recommend this game, be prepared to cough up a few extra dollars for each killer or character. Outside of the large amounts of DLC this game also suffers from a very ambitious design, meaning a lot of learning is needed to get good at this title or to simply understand the numerous amounts of perks, items, charms and etc. I've noticed a balancing issue if you are trying to play with someone much higher leveled than yourself due to the abilities and bonuses unlocked at higher levels. So if this is a game you wish to purchase, do not make the same mistake as I did, I'd suggest learning the ropes on your own unless you have people to play with around your own rank. It also seems that the developers love adding new content, as this game receives new DLC and content rather often.

Five months later, the Roseville Murders began: victims ranging from young to old, stabbed to death in their homes. The whole staff was working the story. Olsen was sent to interview the family of victims and relay official statements from the police.

Jogo a bastante tempo,e um jogo bem legal,Possui gráficos agradáveis e jogabilidade interessante,além de personagens icônicos de varias franquias.Os contras do jogo são o matchmaking que pode ser bem demorado,as vezes demora 20 minutos ou mais pra achar uma partida,a comunidade e um pouco tóxica as vezes mas n são muitos a maioria e gente boa,não e raro encontrar glitches nesse jogo,se você e daqueles tipos que se estressa com bugs,não experimente mas caso não alguns glitches são bem engraçados
Nota 8.0/10.0

Ok, so imagine you're walking down the street.  You are fucking tired, bored, and just want to go home. That is what playing Dead by daylight feels like except once you die you, guess what… you get to spend the rest of the game doing nothing!!!

 The person who plays the role as the killer will be hunting you and you alone for the whole game so they can kill you as soon as possible and then xp boost farm with their gay ass fucking friends while holding hands and french kissing while eating out each others assholes. If you are given this game as a gift then it is guaranteed that the person sending the game has placed a fucking hit on you through the steam store and you won’t wake up the next morning. However, if by some slight chance a hit wasn’t placed on you and you are safe and sound the next morning,  you can now buy shitty DLC for ten to twenty dollars each that gives you one or two new characters and maybe some other shit! Now that you’ve installed the game and bought some DLC like the cuck you are, you can now suffer while playing the worst fucking game ever. The gameplay consists of 4 survivors running around a medium sized map trying to repair generators while a killer chases them around trying to prevent them from leaving. This is an interesting concept, but that's all it is. While actually playing the game you will soon realize that the killer is so fucking easy that a braindead infant could win a game with his eyes closed as all you do is left click when you are near a survivor. Playing as the survivor grants you the chance to experience death and nothing but it. As soon as the killer sees you, you’re fucking dead because he will chase you to the ends of the earth until you are dead. One hit from the killer will speed you up but it doesn’t matter because as you’re running you will make as much sound as firing an AK-47 off right next to another man’s ear in Counter-Strike, so the killer is able to hear you at all times. At this point, the killer might as well be a fucking black ops agent with wall-hacks and a full auto M4A4.

Looking back Dead By Daylight is the worst game ever. If you play it and get enjoyment out of it you are wrong. Don’t vote my review as being funny because that is basically physical assault. I want my money back but unfortunately I fell asleep from how boring this game is so I can’t refund it. That seems to be how so many people have so many hours in this game. People who play Dead By Daylight don’t actually play it. They just launch the game thinking that they will have a fun time and fall asleep and gain so many hours. Don’t play Dead By Daylight it fucking sucks and is not healthy whatsoever. I know you likely aren’t reading negative reviews, but I truly hope you take this one to heart. I am one of the strongest advocates against this game and for good reason. It is hot shit, and I know you’ll agree with me when you play 20 minutes, puke, and refund it as soon as possible. Thank you for reading my review, and don’t buy this game. 
P.S. Behaviour Digital Inc.: If you are reading this fuck you, fuck your game, and fuck you for making this game. You guys are all bald sacks of shit and should do something worthwhile with your development time like seeing how many flights of stairs you have to jump down to die. Thank you for giving me substance to shit on, your game sucks.

Скажу а плюсах и минусах игры сначала плюсы. Большое разнообразие в скинах маньяках выживших и этого будет ещё больше каждые 3 месяца также ты можеш играть не один а с друзьями в приватке или играть за выживших против маньяка у каждого героя есть свой лор. Теперь о минусах довольно долгий поиска но так не всегда ещо самый большой минус игры как мне кажется когда вы достигните примерно 10 ранга вам будут попадатся почти каждую игру тима 4,3, ранга когда повтаряюсь у вас 10 ранг. Ну а так всё хорошо саветаю покупать

I love this game! 
its a different type of multiplayer experience than any other game.
I want the opinion of others about how they feel about the game and why.

Takes some time to get into, give it like 3-5 hours and you will know is it for you or not. Has a lot of survivors and killers and all of their skill sets are different. Game has some bugs etc. but in the end I find it really enjoyable, and would recommend it for people who like co-op/horror games.

8/10
